clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of LY3295668 Erbumine in Participants With Breast Cancer That Has Spread to Other Parts of the Body
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1b Study of Aurora A Kinase Inhibitor LY3295668 Erbumine in Monotherapy and Combination Therapy in Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer Post CDK4/6 Inhibitor and Endocrine Therapy

brief_summary.textblock: The reason for this study is to determine the recommended phase 2 dose of the study drug LY3295668 erbumine in participants with breast cancer that has spread to other parts of the body.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Dose Reductions
primary_outcome.description: Number of Participants with Dose Reductions

primary_outcome.measure: Part II: Number of Participants with Dose Limiting Toxicities (DLTs)
primary_outcome.description: Part II: Number of Participants with DLTs

primary_outcome.measure: Overall Response Rate (ORR): Percentage of Participants Who Achieve Complete Response (CR) or Partial Response (PR)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Measured Progressive Disease (Estimated up to 23 Months)
Date of CR or PR to Date of Disease Progression or Death Due to Any Cause (Estimated up to 23 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical Benefit Rate (CBR): Percentage of Participants Who Achieve CR, PR or SD With a Duration of At Least 6 Months
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline through Disease Progression or Death Due to Any Cause (Estimated up to 23 Months)
Baseline to Objective Progression or Death Due to Any Cause (Estimated up to 23 Months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics (PK): Area Under the Concentration Time Curve (AUC) of LY3295668
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 2 Day 1 (28 Day Cycles)

secondary_outcome.measure: PK: AUC of LY3295668 in Combination with Endocrine Therapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 2 Day 1 (28 Day Cycles)
secondary_outcome.description: PK: AUC of LY3295668 in Combination with Endocrine Therapy

secondary_outcome.measure: PK: AUC of Endocrine Therapy in Combination with LY3295668
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 2 Day 1 (28 Day Cycles)
secondary_outcome.description: PK: AUC of Endocrine Therapy in Combination with LY3295668

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 2 Day 1 (28 Day Cycles)

secondary_outcome.measure: PK: AUC of Midazolam in Combination with LY3295668
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose Cycle 1 Day 1 through Cycle 2 Day 1 (28 Day Cycles)
secondary_outcome.description: PK: AUC of Midazolam in Combination with LY3295668

arm_group.description: LY3295668 erbumine administered orally (Part I). Approximately the first 10 participants enrolled in this arm will be administered midazolam.
LY3295668 erbumine administered orally (Part I). Approximately the first 10 participants enrolled in this arm will be administered midazolam.
LY3295668 erbumine administered orally and endocrine therapy administered according to package label (Part II).

arm_group.description: LY3295668 erbumine administered orally and endocrine therapy administered according to package label (Part I).

arm_group.description: LY3295668 erbumine administered orally and endocrine therapy administered according to package label (Part I).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participant must have hormone receptor positive and HER2 negative metastatic breast cancer
- Participant must have progressed on at least 1 line of endocrine therapy and 1 cyclin dependent kinase (CDK)4/6 inhibitor
- Participant must be able and willing to undergo mandatory tumor biopsy
- Participant must have normal organ function
- Participant must be able to swallow capsules
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participant must not have had prior chemotherapy for mBC. Chemotherapy in the adjuvant/neoadjuvant setting is permitted
- Participant must not be currently enrolled in a clinical study
- Participant must not have another serious medical condition
- Participant must not have previously received an aurora kinase inhibitor
